message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this valuable product. I believe it will be a great asset to your business, and I'm confident you'll see the value in it. My initial offer is $1,450,000.  Let's discuss and see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still a bit higher than that.  I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000.  I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and our ongoing negotiation. Let's see if we can find common ground.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,250,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your position, but I'm still not comfortable going that low.  I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,300,000. This is my final offer. If we can't reach an agreement, I'll have to move on to other options.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
